name: Clean, whiten and destyle pages
description: Whitens the screen to make it look like you're reading plain text, for example at work or school. Makes images lighter until you hover your mouse over them. All site styles are turned white while keeping layout, so you can enjoy reading colorful or looking at facebook without worrying about looking like you aren't working
additional_info: Although most site work, others may not. This is not meant to be enabled all the time, just as a per-use basis.
